content.rendered:
The City’s Savviest Nannies for United States’s Busiest Families

A boutique Nanny and Newborn Care placement agency that carefully and mindfully matches qualified, dedicated care providers with families in the United States City and Tri-State area.

Get Started

As Seen In

Your children are your whole world.

A great nanny acts as an extension of you in your absence, supporting your values and preferences, and aligning with your parenting style and philosophies to provide a secure, safe, and united home.

Find Your Nanny
Find Your Family

We don't want to be everything to everyone - we want to be everything to those who seek a higher standard of in-home childcare.

This is the most important hire you will make—ever! You need a team with the experience, knowledge, and insight to source those who not only excel but truly belong in the childcare field. We believe nanny placement is its own essential entity in the home staffing industry and therefore deserves our full and singular attention.

Why Nannies by Noa?

Our Proven Process in a United States Minute

01

Let’s start at the very beginning.

Complete our simple form to begin the process and we’ll schedule a complimentary call to talk about your family’s needs.

02

We make your list & check it twice.

If we’re the right fit, we’ll take a deep dive on a consultation call. Tell us your wish list, and we’ll do the rest!

03

Say yes to the very best.

We’ll connect you with not only United States’s savviest and most dedicated care providers, but the best of the best!

04

Interviewed, trialed, ready to hire?

We’ll help you define an offer & work agreement that sets up a strong foundation and incentivizes longevity and transparency.

Find Your Nanny
Find Your Family

Now Offering Newborn Care Services

The City may never sleep, but you can...

with our Newborn Care Support.

Those first precious days go by in the blink of an eye. Breathe, rest, recover, and enjoy every precious moment as you ease into parenthood with your new little one – all while enjoying the skilled and gentle support of our newborn care specialists.

Learn More
Join Our Network

Don’t just take our word for it…

I highly recommend this agency...
We hired our nanny 8 months ago and she continues to work with us. We are thrilled with our nanny and the seamless process of finding out incredible nanny through this agency.Noor N. | Parent
Nannies by Noa is a wonderful agency to work with…
I felt confident that they were doing their due diligence in finding the jobs that were the best fit for me. I can definitely tell that they respect nannies and the industry, and advocate for the nannies during the process.Ticiana R. | Nanny
NbN does a great job listening...
to what you want/need in a position and matches you accordingly. They are invested in finding the right fit between nannies and families and not just randomly putting people togetherEl G. | Parent
I can confidently say I trust Nannies by Noa...
NbN has been nothing but kind and welcoming. I definitely recommend to any family stressed in the searching process and are looking to hire asap for a top-notch nanny.Inesa S. | Nanny
I could not have asked for a better experience...
NbN was kind and patient while my husband and I decided what we were looking for and accommodated our requests perfectly. They were quick and found three prospective nannies for us to interview in just a few days.Georgia N. | Parent
Nannies by Noa is an incredibly organized and wonderful company...
I applied to be a nanny there, and each round of interviews was warm, kind, and helpful. They take their vetting process very seriously which made me feel confident I'd be matched with the perfect family.Lilly S. | Nanny
I can't say enough good things about this nanny agency...
NbN operates with such integrity and genuinely cares about each and every family they serve. Believe me when I say that if you are looking for the best nannies in NY, you will be in great hands with Nannies By Noa! Rosalind P. | Parent
You've found the best agency in the city!
From the moment of my initial contact, I realized this was an exceptional agency to work with. NbN has raised the industry standard by which all others should follow.Matt S. | Nanny

NbN BY THE NUMBERS

of Toothless Grins & Sticky High Fives
Find Your Nanny
Become a Nanny
